mapper.sql: sysDictionaryItem.item_id, sysDictionaryItem.dict_code, sysDictionaryItem.dict_name, sysDictionaryItem.item_code, sysDictionaryItem.item_name, sysDictionaryItem.item_value, sysDictionaryItem.enable_flag, sysDictionaryItem.comments
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_dictionary_item sysDictionaryItem WWHERE sysDictionaryItem.use_flag = 1

SELECT
FROM sys_dictionary_item sysDictionaryItem WHERE 1 = 1 AND sysDictionaryItem.use_flag = 1
AND sysDictionaryItem.dict_code = #{dictCode}
AND sysDictionaryItem.dict_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dictName}, '%')
AND sysDictionaryItem.item_code = #{itemCode}
AND sysDictionaryItem.item_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{itemName}, '%')
AND sysDictionaryItem.item_value LIKE CONCAT('%', #{itemValue}, '%')
AND sysDictionaryItem.enable_flag LIKE CONCAT('%', #{enableFlag}, '%')
AND sysDictionaryItem.comments LIKE CONCAT('%', #{comments}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_dictionary_item ( item_id, dict_code, dict_name, item_code, item_name, item_value, create_time, update_time, enable_flag, comments ) VALUES ( #{itemId}, #{dictCode}, #{dictName}, #{itemCode}, #{itemName}, #{itemValue}, #{enableFlag}, #{comments} )

INSERT INTO sys_dictionary_item ( item_id, dict_code, dict_name, item_code, item_name, item_value, create_time, update_time, enable_flag, comments ) VALUES
( #{item.itemId}, #{item.dictCode}, #{item.dictName}, #{item.itemCode}, #{item.itemName}, #{item.itemValue}, #{item.enableFlag}, #{item.comments} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE sys_dictionary_item
dict_code = #{dictCode},
dict_name = #{dictName},
item_code = #{itemCode},
item_name = #{itemName},
item_value = #{itemValue},
enable_flag = #{enableFlag},
comments = #{comments}
WHERE item_id = #{itemId}

update.foreach:
UPDATE sys_dictionary_item
dict_code = #{item.dictCode},
dict_name = #{item.dictName},
item_code = #{item.itemCode},
item_name = #{item.itemName},
item_value = #{item.itemValue},
enable_flag = #{item.enableFlag},
comments = #{item.comments}
WHERE item_id = #{item.itemId}

mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM sys_dictionary_item WHERE item_id IN
#{itemId}
